segments.source_content:
---
slug: /229
title: "This Week In React #229: React Conf, React Router, Next.js Adapters, Redwood, Apollo, Fastify, Vite, Waku | RN v0.79, Deep Imports, Builder Bob, Fingerprinting | TC39, Tailwind, Rspack, Rstest, Turborepo, Bun"
authors: [kacperkapusciak, tomekzaw]
date: 04-09-2025
---
This week, I'm excited to introduce 2 new contributors to help me with the newsletter!

translations.zh-hant: 本週，我很高興介紹兩位新貢獻者來協助製作這份通訊！

segments.source_content: **Tomasz and Kacper from [Software Mansion](https://swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here – you may already know us from libraries like Reanimated or Gesture Handler. We're happy to be among the authors of the This Week in React newsletter!

translations.zh-hant: **[Software Mansion](https://swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) 的 Tomasz 和 Kacper** 在此——您可能已經從 Reanimated 或 Gesture Handler 等函式庫認識我們。我們很榮幸成為《This Week in React》通訊的作者之一！

segments.source_content: We were about to call it a fairly calm week… until React Conf 2025 was officially announced and React Native 0.79 dropped with Swift-compatible native modules for iOS, faster app startup on Android, and many more. Let's dive in!

translations.zh-hant: 我們原本以為這是相當平靜的一週⋯⋯直到 React Conf 2025 正式宣布，以及 React Native 0.79 發布了 iOS 的 Swift 相容原生模組、Android 更快的應用啟動速度等眾多更新。讓我們深入探討！

segments.source_content: [![React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](/emails/issues/229/marmelab.jpg)](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)

translations.zh-hant: [![React-admin：是的，您當然可以自己造輪子⋯⋯但何必呢？](/emails/issues/229/marmelab.jpg)](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)

segments.source_content: **[React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)**

translations.zh-hant: **[React-admin：是的，您當然可以自己造輪子⋯⋯但何必呢？](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)**

segments.source_content: You didn’t spend years mastering React just to build CRUD apps on repeat. Yet here you are—facing another request for an admin panel and questioning your life choices.

translations.zh-hant: 您花費多年精通 React，絕非為了重複打造 CRUD 應用程式。但此刻您卻面臨又一個管理面板需求，並質疑自己的人生選擇。

segments.source_content: We've been there ourselves. That’s why we built [**react-admin**](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)—an open-source framework that handles the boring parts (data fetching, forms, auth, permissions…) so you can focus on the real dev work.

translations.zh-hant: 我們親身經歷過。因此我們打造了 [**react-admin**](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)——一個開源框架，幫您處理枯燥部分（資料獲取、表單、身份驗證、權限⋯⋯），讓您專注於真正的開發工作。

segments.source_content: Powered by **Material UI, react-hook-form, react-router, react-query, and TypeScript**, it lets you build admins on top of any REST/GraphQL API—fast.

translations.zh-hant: 基於 **Material UI、react-hook-form、react-router、react-query 和 TypeScript**，讓您能在任何 REST/GraphQL API 上快速建構管理系統。

segments.source_content: So next time your PM asks for a new dashboard, skip the existential crisis. [Just use react-admin.](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin)

translations.zh-hant: 下次您的產品經理要求新儀表板時，跳過存在主義危機吧。[直接使用 react-admin。](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin)

segments.source_content: The React conference is happening on October 7-8, 2025 in Henderson, Nevada, 🇺🇸 US. It’s where the React & React Native team shares official announcements live.

translations.zh-hant: React 大會將於 2025 年 10 月 7-8 日在美國內華達州亨德森 🇺🇸 舉行。這是 React & React Native 團隊現場發布官方公告的場合。

segments.source_content: The only way to attend the conference in person is to win a ticket lottery that lets you purchase up to 2 tickets. Fortunately, if you’re not one of the lucky ones, the event will be livestreamed for free.

translations.zh-hant: 親臨現場的唯一方式是贏得門票抽籤，中籤者可購買最多 2 張門票。幸運的是，若您未中籤，活動將提供免費線上直播。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [Product for Engineers - Good taste makes great products: Simple design principles every engineer should know](https://go.posthog.com/twir-apr9)
- 📣 [The Future of Redwood Launches Today](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/the-future-of-redwood-launches-today/7938): The former project gets renamed to Redwood GraphQL and enters maintenance mode. [RedwoodSDK](https://redwoodjs.com/) is the new path for the framework under new leadership.
- 💬 [Next.js RFC – Deployment Adapters API](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/77740): Vercel plans to support adapters to deploy Next.js to any hosting provider.
- 🐦 [Tanner Linsley – TanStack Router \`intent\` preloading will predict where your users cursor will go](https://x.com/tannerlinsley/status/1908723776650355111)
- 🔐 [React Router and the Remix’ed path](https://zhero-web-sec.github.io/research-and-things/react-router-and-the-remixed-path): Vulnerability discovered affecting both React Router and Remix, a flaw for a potential DoS attack through cache poisoning.
- 📜 [React for Two Computers](https://overreacted.io/react-for-two-computers/): Dan Abramov expands on his React Conf talk with fresh insights to help you build a solid mental model of React Server Components and their origins.
- 📜 [Advanced React in the Wild](https://largeapps.dev/case-studies/advanced/): A great case study outlining 5 companies that have significantly improved the performance metrics of their React & Next.js sites and how they did it.
- 📜 [React & live streaming: How to include video mixing in your app](https://blog.swmansion.com/react-live-streaming-how-to-include-video-mixing-in-your-app-c460e09da7a8). A short tutorial explaining how to mix live video with React syntax and stream the output directly from the browser.
- 📜 [Why We Moved off Next.js](https://documenso.com/blog/why-we-moved-off-next-js): Quick feedback from the Documenso project, moving from Next.js App Router to Vite and React Router.
- 📜 [React.memo Demystified: When It Helps and When It Hurts](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-memo-when-it-helps-when-it-hurts): A concise explanation of common misconceptions and hidden pitfalls of memoization.
- 📜 [React Reconciliation: The Hidden Engine Behind Your Components](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-reconciliation-deep-dive/): Practical guidelines and clean architecture tips to ensure best performance with React reconciler
- 📜 [Why you need a custom context provider](https://gabrielpichot.fr/blog/why-you-need-a-custom-context-provider/): A nice interactive article that shows creating a custom Context Provider wrapper component can reduce un-necessary re-renders.
- 💸 [Supabase breaks the norms of traditional software architecture. Learn how.](https://go.clerk.com/pkKoKSg)
- 📦 [React Router 7.5 – new `route.lazy` API](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v750): Allows for more granular lazy loading.
- 📦 [Cloudflare Vite Plugin 1.0](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-the-cloudflare-vite-plugin/): Brings official support for React Router v7. Leverages Vite v6 Environment API so that your local dev server matches the production Cloudflare Workers runtime.
- 📦 [Fastify React 1.0](https://github.com/fastify/fastify-vite/releases/tag/react-v1.0.0): This new package might help you assemble your custom React meta-framework based on the Fastify web server and Vite (creating your own “Mini Next.js”). It supports React 19, and RSCs will come later. See also the related launch post ([React Server Confusion](https://hire.jonasgalvez.com.br/2025/apr/8/react-server-confusion/)) which also gives a good overview of the state of RSC support outside Webpack.
- 📦 [Apollo Client Next.js integration](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/apollo-client-integration-nextjs-officially-released): The experimental GraphQL client integration package is now officially stable, including a new implementation for `PreloadQuery` to help you avoid request waterfalls. Apollo Client v4 is now in alpha, and integration packages for React Router / TanStack Start being worked on.
- 📦 [Waku 0.22 – Announcing API routes](https://waku.gg/blog/api-routes)
- 📦 [Astro 5.6 – Global `astro:env` and experimental sessions on Cloudflare, experimental cookie-less sessions](https://astro.build/blog/astro-560/)
- 📦 [Hydrogen – March 2025 release – Support for Vite 6, turn on Remix `v3_routeConfig` flag 6](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/update/march-2025)
- 🎥 [Theo – A breakdown of style solutions for 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lIUp8bdKiq4)
- 🎥 [Youssef Benlemlih – The Magic Of Compound Components in React](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSM2MpJIwFg)
With Microsoft AppCenter shutdown, choose the reliable and robust alternative that doesn't compromise on security, privacy or performance.

translations.zh-hant: 隨著 Microsoft AppCenter 終止服務，請選擇不犧牲安全性、隱私或效能的可靠替代方案。

segments.source_content:
- ✅ Seamless transition: One-command migration from AppCenter
- ✅ Enterprise-grade security: Code signing, SAML SSO, IP allowlisting and more
- ✅ Performance at scale: High-availability architecture with fast global CDN
- ✅ Privacy-first approach: EU-based infrastructure with built-in GDPR compliance features
- ✅ Dedicated support: Priority handling and satisfied customers

translations.zh-hant:
- ✅ 無縫過渡：一鍵從 AppCenter 遷移
- ✅ 企業級安全性：程式碼簽署、SAML SSO、IP 允許清單等功能
- ✅ 大規模效能：具備快速全球 CDN 的高可用性架構
- ✅ 隱私優先方法：基於歐盟的基礎設施，內建 GDPR 合規功能
- ✅ 專屬支援：優先處理與滿意客戶

segments.source_content: Our platform is built by developers managing high-traffic applications who understand what's at stake when pushing critical updates.

translations.zh-hant: 我們的平台由管理高流量應用程式的開發者打造，他們深知推送關鍵更新時的核心風險。
立即使用 AppZung [開始部署](https://appzung.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=this_week_in_react_250409)！
**[React Native 0.79 – 更快的工具及更多功能](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2025/04/08/react-native-0.79)**

segments.source_content: Recently, the React Native core team switched to more frequent release cycles, so this is a smaller release, but nonetheless exciting in terms of performance improvements. Here are the highlights:

translations.zh-hant: 近期 React Native 核心團隊轉向更頻繁的發布週期，儘管這是較小的版本，但在效能改進方面仍令人振奮。重點如下：

segments.source_content:
- Metro: 3x faster cold startup and package exports support
- JavaScriptCore (JSC) moving to a Community Package
- iOS: Swift-Compatible Native Modules registration
- Android: Faster app startup thanks to skipping the JS bundle compression
- Removal of Remote JS Debugging

translations.zh-hant:
- Metro：3 倍速冷啟動及套件匯出支援
- JavaScriptCore (JSC) 移至社群套件
- iOS：Swift 相容的原生模組註冊
- Android：藉由跳過 JS 套件壓縮，實現更快的應用啟動
- 移除遠端 JS 除錯功能

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [Radon IDE – More than 20,000 engineers have already chosen it for a smoother, all-in-one development experience. It's your turn.](https://ide.swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
- 👀 [Expo – React 19.1 `captureOwnerStack` will enable improved error messages](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/35866#issuecomment-2789891297)
- 💬 [React Native RFC – Removing deep imports from react-native](https://github.com/huntie/react-native-discussions-and-proposals/blob/proposal-deprecate-subpath-imports/proposals/0894-deprecate-subpath-imports.md): This change allows to define what functions are exported from packages shrinking the API surface area. The goal is to provide a more stable API throughout the ecosystem.
- 🐦 [Ben Awad – describes his journey to reduce Application Not Responding (ANR) errors on Android](https://x.com/benawad/status/1908860185113665889)
- ☂️ [Help React Native core team Kotlin-ify React Native tests](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/50513): Great way to start contributing to an open source project.
- 📅 [React Native London Meetup – April 17th, 2025](https://guild.host/events/react-native-london-e0q1f1)
- 📜 [Understanding and comparing fingerprints in Expo apps](https://expo.dev/blog/understanding-and-comparing-fingerprints-in-expo-apps): Using hashes to compare whether there was a change in a native build of a React Native & Expo app.
- 📜 [Cut CI from 20 minutes to 6 with EAS Workflows and EAS Updates](https://shift.infinite.red/cut-ci-from-20-minutes-to-6-with-eas-workflows-and-eas-updates-8d928fe5dcfc): Infinite Red shows how they improved their CI time by fingerprinting native builds.
- 📜 [Playing Audio in React Native with react-native-track-player](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-04-04/playing-audio-in-react-native/)
- 📜 [Vercel & React Native – A New Era of Mobile Development?](https://www.thisdot.co/blog/vercel-and-react-native-a-new-era-of-mobile-development): Speculation on what steps Vercel might take in the React Native space.
- 📜 [A Guide to Logging in React Native](https://blog.sentry.io/a-guide-to-logging-in-react-native/): Including console, native and system logs.
- 📦 [Builder Bob 0.40](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-builder-bob/releases/tag/react-native-builder-bob%400.40.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm – The ultimate way to build apps in 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acj7-3-EQWM)
- 🎥 [Catalin Miron – Expo Router: Tabs, Stacks, Deep Linking Fix](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmbBzw0rF6w)
- 🎙️ [React Native Radio 327 – Automating App Releases with Pratul Kalia](https://infinite.red/react-native-radio/rnr-327-automating-app-releases-with-pratul-kalia)

translations.zh-hant:
- 💸 [Radon IDE – 已有超過 20,000 名工程師選擇它來獲得更流暢、一體化的開發體驗。現在輪到您了。](https://ide.swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
- 👀 [Expo – React 19.1 的 `captureOwnerStack` 將啟用改進的錯誤訊息](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/35866#issuecomment-2789891297)
- 💬 [React Native RFC – 從 react-native 移除深層導入](https://github.com/huntie/react-native-discussions-and-proposals/blob/proposal-deprecate-subpath-imports/proposals/0894-deprecate-subpath-imports.md)：此變更允許定義從套件導出的函數，縮小 API 表面積。目標是在整個生態系統中提供更穩定的 API。
- 🐦 [Ben Awad – 描述他在 Android 上減少應用程式無回應 (ANR) 錯誤的歷程](https://x.com/benawad/status/1908860185113665889)
- ☂️ [協助 React Native 核心團隊將 React Native 測試 Kotlin 化](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/50513)：參與開源專案的絕佳入門方式。
- 📅 [React Native 倫敦聚會 – 2025年4月17日](https://guild.host/events/react-native-london-e0q1f1)
- 📜 [理解並比較 Expo 應用中的指紋](https://expo.dev/blog/understanding-and-comparing-fingerprints-in-expo-apps)：使用哈希值來比較 React Native 和 Expo 應用的原生版本是否有變更。
- 📜 [使用 EAS Workflows 和 EAS Updates 將 CI 從 20 分鐘縮短至 6 分鐘](https://shift.infinite.red/cut-ci-from-20-minutes-to-6-with-eas-workflows-and-eas-updates-8d928fe5dcfc)：Infinite Red 展示他們如何透過指紋辨識原生版本來優化 CI 時間。
- 📜 [使用 react-native-track-player 在 React Native 中播放音訊](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-04-04/playing-audio-in-react-native/)
- 📜 [Vercel 與 React Native – 行動開發的新時代？](https://www.thisdot.co/blog/vercel-and-react-native-a-new-era-of-mobile-development)：推測 Vercel 可能在 React Native 領域採取的措施。
- 📜 [React Native 日誌記錄指南](https://blog.sentry.io/a-guide-to-logging-in-react-native/)：涵蓋控制台、原生和系統日誌。
- 📦 [Builder Bob 0.40](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-builder-bob/releases/tag/react-native-builder-bob%400.40.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm – 2025 年建置應用的終極方式](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acj7-3-EQWM)
- 🎥 [Catalin Miron – Expo Router：標籤頁、堆疊、深度連結修復](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmbBzw0rF6w)
- 🎙️ [React Native Radio 第327集 – 與 Pratul Kalia 談自動化應用發布](https://infinite.red/react-native-radio/rnr-327-automating-app-releases-with-pratul-kalia)

segments.source_content:
- 👀 [Agenda for the 107th meeting of Ecma TC39](https://github.com/tc39/agendas/blob/main/2025/04.md): Next week the TC39 committee meets again to discuss many new exciting proposals, including Enums, Composites, `export defer`, and more.
- 📜 [Debugging JavaScript Memory Leaks](https://bun.sh/blog/debugging-memory-leaks)
- 📜 [First Look at The Modern CSS `attr()`](https://ishadeed.com/article/modern-attr/)
- 📜 [A Deep Dive into OSI, TCP/UDP, HTTP, and More](https://www.deepintodev.com/blog/how-data-travels-the-world-to-reach-your-screen)
- 📦 [Tailwind CSS 4.1 – Text shadows, masks, and tons more](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/tailwindcss-v4-1)
- 📦 [Rspack 1.3.1 – Run JS loaders in parallel](https://x.com/rspack_dev/status/1907336863096123484)
- 📦 [Turborepo 2.5](https://turbo.build/blog/turbo-2-5)
- 📦 [Rstest – The testing framework powered by Rspack (WIP)](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rstest)
- 📦 [Bun 1.2.9 – Redis client, Node.js compatibility, `require` improvements](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.2.9)

translations.zh-hant:
- 👀 [第107屆Ecma TC39會議議程](https://github.com/tc39/agendas/blob/main/2025/04.md)：下週TC39委員會將再次召開會議，討論包括枚舉(Enums)、組合(Composites)、`export defer`等眾多令人興奮的新提案。
- 📜 [JavaScript記憶體洩漏偵錯指南](https://bun.sh/blog/debugging-memory-leaks)
- 📜 [現代CSS `attr()`函數初探](https://ishadeed.com/article/modern-attr/)
- 📜 [深入解析OSI模型、TCP/UDP、HTTP等網路協定](https://www.deepintodev.com/blog/how-data-travels-the-world-to-reach-your-screen)
- 📦 [Tailwind CSS 4.1 - 新增文字陰影、遮罩等豐富功能](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/tailwindcss-v4-1)
- 📦 [Rspack 1.3.1 - 支援並行執行JavaScript載入器](https://x.com/rspack_dev/status/1907336863096123484)
- 📦 [Turborepo 2.5](https://turbo.build/blog/turbo-2-5)
- 📦 [Rstest - 基於Rspack的測試框架(開發中)](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rstest)
- 📦 [Bun 1.2.9 - 新增Redis客戶端、提升Node.js相容性及`require`功能](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.2.9)
